mapper.insert: INSERT INTO choices( id, quiz_id, body, is_deleted ) VALUES ( #{entity.identifier.id}, #{entity.quizId}, #{entity.body}, #{entity.isDeleted} )
mapper.select: SELECT choices.id AS choice_id, choices.quiz_id AS choice_quiz_id, choices.body AS choice_body, choices.is_deleted AS choice_is_deleted, choices.created_at AS choice_created_at, choices.updated_at AS choice_updated_at, quizzes.id AS quiz_id, quizzes.event_id AS quiz_event_id, quizzes.body AS quiz_body, quizzes.correct_answer AS quiz_correct_answer, quizzes.type AS quiz_type, quizzes.is_deleted AS quiz_is_deleted, quizzes.created_at AS quiz_created_at, quizzes.updated_at AS quiz_updated_at FROM choices LEFT JOIN quizzes ON choices.quiz_id = quizzes.id WHERE (choices.is_deleted = false OR choices.is_deleted = #{includeDeleted}) ORDER BY choices.id
